title: ID "foods"
content:
Hey everyone,

I am trying to figure out this "foods" typeface. I thought it was Eurostile extended, however, the F and S are much different. If you can lend any knowledge on this I would greatly appreciate it.

Many thanks,  
John

[http://www.packagingelevators.com/foods.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020154034/http:/www.packagingelevators.com/foods.jpg)

author: feldhouse

comments.content: Thank you! It was on the tip of my tongue. ;)
